Detailed Description

Object used to bootstrap a rendering subsystem.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void omi::render::ss::Bootstrap::startup ( )
inlinevirtual

Starts up this Omicron rendering subsystem.

Other than the Bootstrap's constructor this will be the first call made to this object, and will only be made once.

Reimplemented in omi_gl::GLBootstrap.

virtual void omi::render::ss::Bootstrap::shutdown ( )
inlinevirtual

Starts up this Omicron rendering subsystem.

Other than the Bootstrap's destructor this will be the last call made to this object, and will only be made once.

Reimplemented in omi_gl::GLBootstrap.
